item.title: RNA-Seq Machine Learning
item.description: Seq data interface RNA-seq Importing DESeq2 Recount2 Batch effect miRNA-seq Metabolism Methylation Machine/Deep Learning interface MLR, Caret, H2O Regression model Two class classification Multiclass classification Survival model Cluster analysis Parallel Shiny package/server Shiny webserver Shiny bioconductor package Abortion PIVOT is a great R package for integrative analysis and visualization of transcriptomics data.
